scripts.serve: yarn gen_config && yarn update_zksync.js && vue-cli-service serve --port=8080
scripts.build: yarn gen_config && yarn update_zksync.js && vue-cli-service build
scripts.update_franklin_lib: cd ../franklin_lib && yarn build && cd ../client && yarn upgrade franklin_lib
scripts.update_zksync.js: cd ../zksync.js && yarn build && cd ../client && yarn upgrade zksync.js
scripts.set_token_name: psql --host=localhost --user=postgres --dbname=plasma --command="update tokens set symbol='FAU' where id=1"
